physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 14 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Written on the front of the photograph: ''June Class 1924 Aaron Gove Junior High School Denver, Colo. - Alex Martin Photo-R.'' Handwritten signatures on the back of the photograph: ''Patsy Lange, June Siems '24, Josephine Connell '24, Belle Deickman, Sophronia Wallace, Tyler A. Shim R. E., Gray Strong, Margaret Lang, Adais Stevenson, Dorothy Schoher '24, Olive Limner, George Bobun Esg, Col. [illegible], Frieda Dezetell '24, Lorraine 'Chile' Hitt '24, Lena Freedman, Clarence Burg, Rudy C. Savage E A, Lester Kohnfelder, Paul Pinney, Iva M. Graham, Harry A King, Helen Kelsey, Mildred Prather, Bonnie Bouiser, Gladys L. Urnshall, [illegible], Shirley Smith, Frances Smith, Joseph Pepper, Bill Cummings, Elizabeth Brohm (?) '24, Dorothy Gardner 9B '25, Goldena Birnstock '24, Charline Johnson '24, Marian Isenberg, Virginia Davidson '24, Miriam Bretschneider, Winifred D Binsson, Alice Salter, Helen McMullen, R. K. Howard Adams, Anders Rasmussen, Rev. Cyrno Drew, Albert Giesecke, Jane Allen Allmond, Paul Schneider, Morey A Samuelson - D.D., Ralph Stechel H.D., John Costa Esq, Geo Work, Arthur Louisberg, Russell Ostrander, Dan Williams, Neil McKenzie, Willis H. Doetschman, Bob Kooney, Walker S. Edwards, Melvin E. Bruckman, Dave Wirth, Henry C. Glange, Olive Pichaus '24, Louise McCreery, Shirley de Spain, Watson Bowes, Willis Engdahl, Calmar Reedy, Hon. Vernon Carlson, Frances Freeman, Teah Klein, Frances P. Miller, Margaret Richman (Percy), Burt Mortz '24, Nathaniel Williams '24, James H Adair, Agnes McLean, Lucille Albright, Josephine Spalding, Sadie Crockett, Charlotte McMullen, Dixie Lee Pitcher, Blanche Calkins, Hazel Immel, Sara-Jean Pinderson, Jane Jones, Innes Lundborg, Jean Patterson 'Pat,' Lucille Bastine, Wilma Coyle '24, Sybil Block '24, Bergliot Larson '24, Newton Anderson, Myrtle Franklin, Della Clingner, Sadye Aronoff 8a, Sadye Fortner 8a '25, Margaret Shamon, Marion Smith, Ruthanna Eames (Head Girl), Roger McDougall, [illegible], Keith Gugis B.C., Jane Blaine, Mary Goadson, Ruth Poss Corn Bumion Richman, Mabel W. Stuart, Willie Frances Cocke (Librarian), Mary E. Biggs, Alice M. Watson, Nelle L. French, Myra A. Carson, Mildred McClintock 305, Helen W. Rodgers, Anna L. Ormond, Marguerite Fry, H.G. Wilford, R.S. Hobson.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: "Aaron Gove Jr. High School 1924, 1st row 5th from R Lester Kohnfelder, 17th from R: Margaret Richman Piehl, 19 '' '' Sybil Block, 2nd row, 1st on R Morey Samuelson, 13th from R Joe Pepper, 3rd row, 15th from R Belle Deickman, 13th from L Frieda Dezetell, #403.''

mods.abstract: A group of students posed in front of Aaron Gove Junior High School located at Colorado Blvd and 14th Ave, Denver, Colorado. Seven students are identified on the back of the photograph: First row fifth from right Lester Kohnfelder, seventeenth from right Margaret Richman Piehl, nineteenth from right Sybil Block; Second row first on right Morey Samuelson, thirteenth from right Joe Pepper; Third row fifteenth from right Belle Deickman, thirteenth from left Frieda Dezetell. Several people signed the back of the photograph: Patsy Lange, June Siems, Josephine Connell, Belle Deickman, Sophronia Wallace, Tyler A. Shim, Gray Strong, Margaret Lang, Adais Stevenson, Dorothy Schoher, Olive Limner, George Bobun, Frieda Dezettel, Lorraine 'Chile' Hitt, Lena Freedman, Clarence Burg, Rudy C. Savage, Lester Kohnfelder, Paul Pinney, Iva M. Graham, Harry A King, Helen Kelsey, Mildred Prather, Bonnie Bowser, Gladys L. Urnshall, Shirley Smith, Frances Smith, Joseph Pepper, Bill Cummings, Elizabeth Brohm, Dorothy Gardner, Goldena Birnstock, Charline Johnson, Marian Isenberg, Virginia Davidson, Miriam Bretschneider, Winifred D Binsson, Alice Salter, Helen McMullen, R.
